knowledge_zone.heading: Allusion: Creates meaning in the text

sections.content: Allusion is used throughout the text to creates meaning in the text.

examples.quote: Quomodo sedet sola civitas. Vanity of vanities, all is vanity
examples.scene: Charles's biblical meditation on Brideshead's desolation
examples.effect: Elevates personal memory to universal lamentation through scriptural reference, exemplifying how elegiac retrospection transforms individual loss into timeless meditation

pedagogy_zone.heading: From Device Spotting to Analysis
pedagogy_zone.intro_text: Most students can identify a device. Strong analysis shows what it DOES. Don't just label it—explain its function in creating meaning.

content.question: Ask yourself: Why does the author use Allusion HERE? What meaning does it create in this specific moment?
content.framework: Use TVODE: Technique → Verb → Observation → Device effect → Evaluation

pedagogy_zone.essay_application: In your essays, always connect device to meaning. Show HOW the technique creates the effect, don't just identify that it's there.
